20110129030025.000|20110129030028.000|TR0|world, for what happens next, Israel's 
20110129030028.000|20110129030030.000|TR0|neighbor, America's ally, capital of the 
20110129030030.000|20110129030032.000|TR0|Arab world in crisis, under curfew, the 
20110129030032.000|20110129030035.000|TR0|government in flux, the man who has run 
20110129030035.000|20110129030037.000|TR0|the country for decades apparently on the 
20110129030037.000|20110129030040.000|TR0|ropes with his people and clearly on 
20110129030040.000|20110129030042.000|TR0|notice from Washington.
20110129030042.000|20110129030044.000|TR0|
20110129030044.000|20110129030047.000|TR0|What we have seen today has been 
20110129030047.000|20110129030049.000|TR0|extraordinary, Egyptians taking to the 
20110129030049.000|20110129030051.000|TR0|streets en masse today and late into the 
20110129030051.000|20110129030054.000|TR0|night, a day of rage that began in the 
20110129030054.000|20110129030056.000|TR0|mosques and spread into the centers of 
20110129030056.000|20110129030058.000|TR0|Cairo and Alexandria, Egypt's second city, 
20110129030058.000|20110129030101.000|TR0|and all across the country.

20110129030233.000|20110129030235.000|TR0|armored personnel carriers have just

20110129030245.000|20110129030247.000|TR0|the worry is that the police have seemed 
20110129030247.000|20110129030250.000|TR0|to have completely disappeared.

20110129030257.000|20110129030259.000|TR0|were watching as the police station right 
20110129030259.000|20110129030301.000|TR0|behind our building was attacked by the 
20110129030301.000|20110129030304.000|TR0|protesters.  All of the police had put on 
20110129030304.000|20110129030306.000|TR0|civilian clothing and ran away.  And we're

20110129030405.000|20110129030408.000|TR0|better democracy and greater economic 
20110129030408.000|20110129030410.000|TR0|opportunity.  I just spoke to him after 
20110129030410.000|20110129030412.000|TR0|his speech.  And I told him he has a 
20110129030412.000|20110129030415.000|TR0|responsibility to give meaning to those 
20110129030415.000|20110129030417.000|TR0|words, to take concrete steps and actions 
20110129030417.000|20110129030419.000|TR0|that deliver on that promise.
20110129030419.000|20110129030422.000|TR0|

20110129030426.000|20110129030429.000|TR0|governments must maintain power through 
20110129030429.000|20110129030431.000|TR0|consent, not coercion.  That is the single

20110129030858.000|20110129030900.000|TR0|they're not stopping the looters, as they

20110129030903.000|20110129030905.000|TR0|that have come to them, and they will be 
20110129030905.000|20110129030908.000|TR0|very well aware of what happened to the

20110129030910.000|20110129030912.000|TR0|off the streets.  It was almost a seminal 
20110129030912.000|20110129030915.000|TR0|moment we watched where one man went up

20110129030924.000|20110129030926.000|TR0|behind him at police.  The police were 
20110129030926.000|20110129030929.000|TR0|throwing the rocks back.  And he calmed 
20110129030929.000|20110129030931.000|TR0|the situation himself.  And the crowds

20110129030934.000|20110129030936.000|TR0|backed off.  More rocks flew, and the 
20110129030936.000|20110129030938.000|TR0|police fled.

20110129031037.000|20110129031040.000|TR0|years old.  So, normally, he -- he stopped

20110129031042.000|20110129031044.000|TR0|He normally resides in the Sharm el-Sheikh 
20110129031044.000|20110129031047.000|TR0|in the Sinai Peninsula.  It's not clear 
20110129031047.000|20110129031049.000|TR0|whether he's there or in Cairo.
20110129031049.000|20110129031052.000|TR0|
20110129031052.000|20110129031054.000|TR0|Certainly, under normal circumstances, 
20110129031054.000|20110129031056.000|TR0|he's there, but his -- his precise 
20110129031056.000|20110129031059.000|TR0|presence are not at all clear.  The speech 
20110129031059.000|20110129031101.000|TR0|he made really shocked a lot of people.

20110129033212.000|20110129033215.000|TR0|put the regime on notice that it could no

20110129033217.000|20110129033219.000|TR0|people, that it had to reopen and allow

20110129033224.000|20110129033226.000|TR0|parties, and that it could not use 
20110129033226.000|20110129033229.000|TR0|violence.
20110129033229.000|20110129033231.000|TR0|
20110129033231.000|20110129033233.000|TR0|And this was the main tool, has been for 
20110129033233.000|20110129033236.000|TR0|decades predating President Mubarak.  And

20110129034708.000|20110129034710.000|TR0|What happened?
